cast.name: 玛丽娜·阿布拉莫维奇 Marina Abramovic

introduction: 《呐喊的声音》是一部艺术类探索性影片，探索了挪威标志性艺术家爱德华•蒙克62年间超过4万件艺术作品中普世的永恒本质内涵。导演小传本片导演Dheeraj Akolkar深深地被英格玛•伯格曼与丽芙•乌曼的生平和作品所吸引。他生于印度，现居伦敦。目前他在自己的Vardo电影公司筹备五部故事片和纪录片系列。电影节经历2013年墨西哥城纪录片电影节2013吕贝克北欧电影节2014蒙特利尔国际艺术电影节Let the Scream be Heard is an artistic investigation to reveal and celebrate the essence behind the universality and timelessness of Iconic Norwegian Artist Edvard Munch’s creation, spanning over 62 years and more than 40,000 works of art.Director BioThe life and work of Bergman and Ullmann has fascinated director Dheeraj Akolkar for many years. He comes from India and lives in London. Currently he is working on a slate of five fiction and documentary films under his company Vardo Films.Festivals2013:DOCSDF International Documentary Film Festival of Mexico City2013:Nordic Film Days Lübeck2014:FIFA - International Festival of Films on Art
